availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Shepherd (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Margaret A. Shanklin Shepherd on May 16, 1850. Father of Margaret E. Shepherd, David R. Shepherd, Eugennia Shepherd, and Thomas Shepherd. Farmer in Robertson County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Robertson County, District 6, p. 43. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Cobbs, p. 109. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 4, p. 6. Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Robertson County, 1850, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN (accessed via Ancestry). Find A Grave, "William Harrison Shepherd (1830-1886)," Memorial #59601829, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=59601829 (accessed June 22, 2017).
